pages.title: Acacia Wood!
pages.text: Gathering $(#FFA500)Acacia Wood $()is simple! This is the 5th capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Item Given: Acacia Wood

pages.name: Capability Level 400
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 400$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Acacia Wood$()
